verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Worthy Worthy Worthy
To receive our praise
Holy Holy Holy
Youre the Son of God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are awesome
God of power
Lord of glory
Come and fill this place

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Awesome
Power
Glory
Fill this place

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You are awesome
Power
Glory
Fill this place

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Holy Holy Holy
You are awesome
Come and fill this place

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
You are awesome
God of mercy
God of righteousness
God of salvation
